roleset.name: fiddle with

example.name: both args
example.text: I'm assuming you already putzed with the Audio Mute button or trying a dummy plug in the input?
example.arg: with the Audio Mute button or trying a dummy plug in the input

example.name: let's hope they're not talking about a plane
example.text: I have putzed with the altitude adjustment, and decided that it's purely decorative.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on Call Home (which contains the phrasal version), internet. No VNcls.

roleset.name: fiddle around with (phrasal)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: The way I kind of see it is like if you want a a so- soft place to lie your head down and fall asleep , and wake up , y- , cook food or whatever and , putz around once in a while , that 's fine .

example.name: both args
example.text: Malory putzed around with the leak under the kitchen sink.
example.arg: with the leak under the kitchen sink

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on Call Home. No VNcls.
